works.description:
The Blogger page has copied the contents 

of my article but have also added irrelevant tags to the page as well.

I have not given permission for them to duplicate my content and would
like  
it removed.

Example text extract:

We love a bullish quote here on Artemis and veteran reinsurance industry  

exec Don Kramer has provided one at the Bermuda Captive Conference which  

has been held over the last few days on the island.
